page.title: 02Wildlife in our area.
page.content: There are quite a lot of{animals}in our area,anything from Red Deer to mice and voles.The most common animals are Roe Deer and rabbits.There are also a lot of hedgehogs,stoats, weasels,moles,hares and house mice. There are many animals which are not so plentiful like badgers,squirrels, wild cats,otters,foxes and pine martins. {Birds}are also common,ranging from herons to wrens.I would say the most popular birds are everyday garden birds like the robin,finches,sparrows, blackbirds,tits,pied wagtails and wrens.There are also birds which are not so plentiful like dippers,eagles, buzzards,owls and ospreys. My favourite animals are rabbits, otters and voles. My favourite birds are pied wagtails,robins,wrens and bullfinches.
